tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_imagery_data (
  satellite_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  image_data BYTEA,
  capture_date TIMESTAMP,
  location GEOMETRY
)

CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    satellite_id INT,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
    acquisition_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_metadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metadata_key VARCHAR(255),
    metadata_value VARCHAR(255),
    image_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    result_type VARCHAR(255),
    result_status VARCHAR(255),
    result_value FLOAT,
    image_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE image_metadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT REFERENCES satellite_images(id),
    capture_date DATE,
    satellite_name TEXT,
    resolution TEXT
);
